oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AGRI-FOOD UNDER THE AFFECT OF GLOBAL NEOLIBERALISM
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dinçer, Ayşe Afet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: There are three food regimes historically. Two of them (colonial-diasporic food regime, mercantile-industrial food regime) belong to pre-neoliberal age, but the last and also current one (corporate food regime) belongs to neoliberal age. I discuss the problems of corporate food regime in the paper.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Dinçer, Ayşe Afet (2014) AGRI-FOOD UNDER THE AFFECT OF GLOBAL NEOLIBERALISM. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
